elements.html: Home News Contact About
elements.css: body {margin: 0; font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;}.topnav {overflow: hidden; background-color: #333;}.topnav a {float: left;color: #f2f2f2;text-align: center;padding: 14px 16px;text-decoration: none;font-size: 17px;}.topnav a:hover {background-color: #ddd;color: black;}.topnav a.active {background-color: #04AA6D;color: white;}

elements.name: Thrillo
elements.html:

Adventures
elements.css: #heroSection { width: 100%; height: 100vh; background-image: url('https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1561359313-0639aad49ca6?ixlib=rb-1.2.1&ixid=MnwxMjA3fDB8MHxwaG90by1wYWdlfHx8fGVufDB8fHx8&auto=format&fit=crop&w=735&q=80'); background-position: center; background-size: cover; display: flex; justify-content: center; } #innerHeroSec { width: 70%; height: 100%; display: flex; flex-direction: column; align-items: center; z-index: 1; justify-content: space-between; } #headerMiddle { width: 100%; max-height: 95%; height: 100%; overflow: hidden; } .blackBg{ width: 100%; height: 100%; position:absolute; background-color: #000; opacity: 0.4; z-index: -1; } #staticText { font-size: 3rem; color: white; font-family: 'Poppins', sans-serif; font-weight: 400; text-align: center; } #dynamicText { font-size: 5rem; color: white; font-family: 'Poppins', sans-serif; font-weight: 600; text-align: center; } #midTop{ height:50% }
